'''14w32d''' is the forty-fifth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.8]], released on August 8, 2014,<ref>{{cite|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20140815000707/https://mojang.com/2014/08/minecraft-snapshot-14w32a/|title=Minecraft snapshot 14w32d|website=Mojang.com|author=[[Dinnerbone]]}}</ref><ref>{{tweet|SeargeDP|497764394143449089|The crash related to joining dedicated servers with the latest snapshot will be fixed in some minutes, I found the cause of it.|August 8, 2014}}</ref> which adds new [[door]]s and fixed a bug in [[14w32c]] that kicked the client when joining dedicated servers.

== Additions ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[Wooden door]]s'''
* [[File:Spruce Door JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[File:Birch Door JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[File:Jungle Door JE1.png|32px]] [[File:Acacia Door JE1.png|32px]] [[File:Dark Oak Door JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[File:Spruce Door (item) JE1.png|32px]] [[File:Birch Door (item) JE1.png|32px]] [[File:Jungle Door (item) JE1.png|32px]] [[File:Acacia Door (item) JE1.png|32px]] [[File:Dark Oak Door (item) JE1.png|32px]]<br>Added new types of doors for all the different wood types: spruce, birch, jungle, acacia and dark oak doors.
** Door recipes now require all six planks to be of the same type.

== Trivia ==
* 14w32d was previously removed from the [[launcher]] for some time, but was added back in September 2018.
